CustomField.description: Account Source Group ID to segregate customers
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(AccountSource, "Alpha Test"), ISPICKVAL(Account_Source_Detail__c, "E&V Friends")), "CnsR7kA", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(AccountSource, "Alpha Test"), ISPICKVAL(Account_Source_Detail__c, "Finleap")), "n7zUWWA", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(AccountSource, "Alpha Test"), ISPICKVAL(Account_Source_Detail__c, "Finleap Connect")), "4LTqdxA", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(AccountSource, "Alpha Test"), ISPICKVAL(Account_Source_Detail__c, "Friends & Family")), "aZK74kA", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(AccountSource, "Website")), "VpUr7XA", "ExpK8UA")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Account Source Group ID to segregate customers
CustomField.label: Account Source Group ID
